me kiyanna yanne hot hot niws ekak gana..me dan sidda una ekak..mama munu pothe karak gahala podi kathawakuth dagena ididi ape kaluwa hewath blaki buranawa ahuna..math ithin oope hoyanna kiyala eliyata gihin wiparamak damma.aspata ho gala buranawa.eyage saddeta anith balu aththoth hu miti thiyanawa.eka yuddhayayi..math ithin sama hamudawa wage giya issarahata..baluwama thalagoyekta thama me kattiya sadda danne.mawa dakka witharayi balu hamudawata thada wela nayakaya hewath blaki thalagoyawa alluwe natha...hapoyi..dan mokada karanne..mahalokuwata giya wageya sama hamudawath thalagoyintayi ballatayi bayayi..ee asse thalagoyata dethis maha wada pamunuwanawa balu hamudawa..sama hamudawath ariye na ballanta wada hayiyen ka gahuwa..(wena karanna deyak na nowa..)onna ithin ethakota thama hitha honda aththek methanata aawe..kage kawda kiyala man danneth naha..hitha honda aththa kohomin kohomin hari thalagoyi mahaththayawa beruwa.aththatama pin siddha wena wadak..oya wage minissu hari hingayi dan..ehema kiyanna hethuwa ape gampalatheth thalagoyi marala masata ganna aththo innawa..sanwegayen unath ee deth kiyanna oone..ehew thalogoyek marenakan balan inna palathaka me wage deyak dulabayi..ee hitha honda aththata upaharayak widihatayi me kathawa liwwe..mehew aththo inna ratak wasanawantha ratak neda?
